name: Steal and Escape: Mission 1
description:
Mission 1 of this puzzle escape adventure series is to retrieve a set of priceless rubies known as ‘Snake Eyes’.
Explore the rooms, discover the hidden clues, collect useful objects and solve challenging puzzles. Open the door to steal the secretly hidden artifact and escape.

Additional Features:
★ Auto save facility
★ In-game video guide
★ Full game for FREE
★ Universal game
